rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer integrating Vastu principles of energy flow. The hall is designed to be bright and airy.
Open concept Scandinavian living room with large windows for ample natural light, complemented by minimalistic decor.
A functional dining area integrated within the open space. It features clean lines and a central table designed in minimalist style.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with an island counter, efficient workspace layout ensuring smooth energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Guest bedroom offering privacy and comfort. Minimalist decor and sufficient natural light ensure adherence to Vastu principles.
Dedicated home office space with ample desk area, built-in storage and quiet atmosphere, located in a corner aligning with Vastu for productivity.
Spacious master bedroom with Scandinavian design elements, featuring a walk-in closet and a private balcony. Vastu guidelines are followed for proper orientation of the bed.
Additional bedroom designed in minimalist style, ensuring privacy and natural light as per local building norms.
Another bedroom in the duplex layout that adheres to Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu principles with balanced energy flow.
A central courtyard designed to act as the heart of the home, with landscaped areas and a water feature for Vastu energy flow.
